availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel S. Parker (Ky, captain and adj gen (U.S.A.))

body.p: Kentucky, soldier. Served in 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as major and captain from September 8, 1862, to December 6, 1862. Served in 13th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as adjutant general from December 23, 1863, to December 10, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 226, 352.
Organization Index to Pension Files of Veterans Who Served Between 1861 and 1900, NARA RG 15, Catalog ID 258825, Roll 438.
